_header: O dear God peerless Prince of Peace
Note: For other texts of this piece see 4079 and 6019.
_description: ‘Miserere mei deus’ — eleven 8-line stanzas with this refrain, ‘Off miserere mei deus’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
O dere god pereles prince of peceWith all my power I the
                    pray…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…& here vs when we rede or syngOff miserere mei
                        deusExplicit
